DOC.brief_title: Comparing Mobile Health ( mHealth ) Clinic-Based Self-Management Interventions Serious Mental Illness
DOC.detailed_description: The objective study compare two illness self-management intervention SMI : clinic-based group protocol ( Wellness Recovery Action Planning WRAP ) mHealth smartphone intervention ( FOCUS ) . The study structure randomize controlled trial , data collect use comprehensive mixed-methods quantitative /qualitative approach . This study evaluate patient willingness enroll one two illness-self management intervention , patient satisfaction , engagement , symptom , recovery quality life . The specific aim study : 1 ) Evaluate compare willingness ability individual SMI enroll two illness self-management intervention ; 2 ) Examine compare participant engagement satisfaction treatment ; 3 ) Examine compare patient outcomes follow participation intervention . Participants randomize receive 12-weeks WRAP FOCUS . Participants allocate WRAP group provide material ( i.e . WRAP binder , handout ) first session meet weekly group train facilitator . Participants FOCUS group give study smartphone device FOCUS application train mHealth support specialist use function smartphone ( i.e . use touchscreen , call , text ) different feature FOCUS intervention .
